author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modified version of EB numbering scheme code which will work with modified EB algorithm. The modified EB algorithm has to be put in a separate PR only when the new dd4hep is merged with the master

#### PR validation:

Tested with the cfg's in SimG4Core/Configuration/test 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Request to integrate the recent dd4hep code with the master
title: Run3-gex71 Modified version of EB numbering scheme code which will work with modified EB algorithm
